appRoles.description: Allows the app to run a live response on a specific machine
appRoles.displayName: Run live response on a specific machine

appRoles.description: Allows the app to read all IOCs
Allows the app to read and modify integration settings between itself and the service
Users assign to this role will be able to access the Windows Defender ATP portal, view all the data but will not be able to perform any action
Users assign to this role will be able to access the Windows Defender ATP portal, view all the data and be able to perform actions such as change alerts status, apply suppression rules etc.
Allows the app to create or update any alert
Allows the app to create IOCs and to read or update IOCs it created
appRoles.displayName: Read and write IOCs belonging to the app

appRoles.description: Allows the app to create events in the machine timeline
Allows the app to run advanced queries
Allows the app to read all machine profiles, including the commands that were sent to each machine
Allows the app to create machine records and to read or update any machine record
appRoles.displayName: Read and write all machine information

appRoles.description: Allows the app to isolate a machine
Allows the app to scan a machine
Allows the app to restrict code execution on a machine according to policy
Allows the app to stop a file running on a machine and to quarantine that file
Allows the app to offboard a machine from the service
Allows the app to read all file profiles
Allows the app to read all URL profiles
Allows the app to read all IP address profiles
Allows the app to read all user profiles
Allows the app to read any alert
Allows the app to collect forensics from a machine
Allows the app to manage all IOCs of the tenant
Allows the app to read any Threat and Vulnerability Management security recommendation
appRoles.displayName: Read Threat and Vulnerability Management security recommendations

appRoles.description: Allows the app to read any Threat and Vulnerability Management software information
appRoles.displayName: Read Threat and Vulnerability Management software information

appRoles.description: Allows the app to read any Threat and Vulnerability Management vulnerability information
appRoles.displayName: Read Threat and Vulnerability Management vulnerability information

appRoles.description: Allows the app to read any Threat and Vulnerability Management  score
appRoles.displayName: Read Threat and Vulnerability Management score

appRoles.description: Allows the app to read all remediation tasks
Allows the app to manage live response library files
Allows the app to read all security configurations
Allows the app to read and write all security configurations
appRoles.displayName: Read and write all security configurations

appRoles.description: Allows the app to read all security baselines assessment information
appRoles.displayName: Read all security baselines assessment information
